name: Captain Carrotstalk
description:
Best played in fullscreen!

You are Captain Tommy Carrotstalk, a distant descendent of the famed Johnny Appleseed. Your dream is to continue his work by spreading your favorite vegetable and namesake — carrots — across the galaxy.

This game features auto-saving.

Controls:

  • [Space] - Thrusters
  • [ A | D ] - Side Thrusters
  • [Arrow Keys ] - Rotate

Join our discord! https://discord.gg/nRv86ntUSd
